oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-04-09 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 9, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Archie Campbell, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1070th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Faron Young; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Grandpa Jones; Porter Wagoner; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Faron Young) (recording) -- Grant Turner introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- There's A Big Wheel (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Grandpa Jones -- Waiting For A Train (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- Legend Of The Big Steeple (Porter Wagoner, Jordanaires) -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Wagoner, Porter; Cooper, Wilma Lee, 1921-2011; Cooper, Stoney, 1918-1977; Young, Faron
